response.overview: For one hundred and fifty years, "Topkhaneh Square" of Tehran has been the center of this city and has witnessed various events that have made the contemporary history of the country. The execution of "Sheikh Fazlullah Nouri" in this square has been one of the most important historical events in this square. This square was built by Mohammad Ibrahim Memar Bashi by order of Nasser al-Din Shah to keep the cannons. This documentary represents the ups and downs of this artillery field.
response.title: Square without fence (میدان بی حصار)
